column1: '''Baravorn''' is the translation into [[Sindarin]] of the [[Hobbitish]] name ''[[Ranugad]]''. [[Aragorn|Elessar]] addressed [[Gaffer Gamgee|Samwise Gamgee]] as such in the ''[[King's Letter]]''.<ref>[[J.R.R. Tolkien]]

column4: is unclear. Though it is usually taken to be related to ''[[boron|bor(o)n]]''
column11: it could also be related to the root ''[[ABA]]''
